title: Bg. 2.65
sanskrit: प्रसादे सर्वदुःखानां हानिरस्योपजायते ।प्रसन्नचेतसो ह्याश‍ु बुद्धिः पर्यवतिष्ठते ॥ ६५ ॥
transliteration: prasāde sarva-duḥkhānāṁhānir asyopajāyateprasanna-cetaso hy āśubuddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate

words_trans.pras\u0101de: on achievement of the causeless mercy of the Lord

literary_trans: For one thus satisfied [in Kṛṣṇa consciousness], the threefold miseries of material existence exist no longer; in such satisfied consciousness, one’s intelligence is soon well established.For one thus satisfied [in Kṛṣṇa consciousness], the threefold miseries of material existence exist no longer; in such satisfied consciousness, one’s intelligence is soon well established.
